[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1683958137880{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;background-image: url(https://hindi-gyan.com/aditya/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Eres-Home2022.jpg?id=8113) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

Complete Property Solutions

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1682632683852{background-color: #792923 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Aditya Estates | Best Property Dealer in Noida | Help line Number : +91 9319988572″ font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1684147006427{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Complete Property Solutions” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center”][vc_column_text]

Aditya Estates not only specializes in the sale and purchase of properties, but it also provides a variety of services related to properties. These services include legal assistance for any property disputes, helping clients complete the necessary property papers, such as a registry of the property or lease agreements, and assistance with government authorities. Additionally, Aditya Estates has a dedicated team to cater to clients’ Vaastu needs, which can help improve the environment of their residence or the growth of their business. The firm also has a panel of interior designers and architects who can provide services to construct a new house or factory according to the client’s preferences or budget, or help renovate existing premises.

Furthermore, Aditya Estates has direct ties with many banks, such as SBI, HDFC, ICICI, PNB, etc., to provide home loans to interested clients. The firm negotiates to provide clients with the best home loan rates possible. By offering a range of services, Aditya Estates ensures that clients can find everything they need related to their properties under one roof, making it a convenient and reliable partner in the real estate market.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Your Requirement- Our Responsibility” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23792923″]






    [vc_single_image image=”7662″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1683630250533{background: #1a1a1a url(https://www.ekko-wp.com/static/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2018/10/parallax.jpg?id=) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515686965699{padding-right: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1684146808990{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1515686937192{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR SERVICES” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23e3c754″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7629″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/fresh-bookings/”]
    Fresh Bookings- Best Terms and Service

    Aditya Estates is a RERA-registered firm with a core competency in fresh booking or primary sale of properties.

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7626″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/resale-best-deals/”]
    Resale- Best Deals

    Aditya Estates is an expert in both fresh bookings and resales of properties from major real estate developers and builders. The firm provides a wide range of services related to the resale of properties,

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7627″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/rent-or-leasing-services/”]
    Rent or Leasing Services

    Aditya Estates offers an extensive database of properties for rent or lease that caters to a variety of requirements, including residential flats or independent houses, commercial office spaces or shops,

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7643″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/personalised-services/”]
    Personalised Services

    At Aditya Estates, the team is committed to providing aggressive marketing and personalized services to help clients find their ideal home or workplace that caters to their specific needs and preferences.

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
